Snecko:MasterEye.NAME: Master Eye
Snecko:MasterEye.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL At the start of each turn, reduce the cost of the highest-cost card in your hand by 1.
Snecko:MasterEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate, Snekproof. NL At the start of each turn, reduce the cost of the highest-cost card in your hand by 1.

Snecko:BlackTutor.NAME: Nightmare Vision
Snecko:BlackTutor.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Lose 5 HP. NL Add either a Status, Curse, or [#180055]Black Card[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Snecko:BlackTutor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Lose 5 HP. NL Add either 2 Statuses, 2 Curses, or 2 [#180055]Black Cards[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Snecko:SingleExchange.NAME: Nope
Snecko:SingleExchange.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. Replace it with a random card of the same type, with a randomized cost.
Snecko:SingleExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. Replace it with a random card of the same type, with a randomized cost.

Snecko:PerplexingGlare.NAME: Perplexing Glare
Snecko:PerplexingGlare.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Each enemy gains between -3 and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Snecko:GrandSneckoForm.NAME: Grand Form
Snecko:GrandSneckoForm.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Gain Orb Slots until you have 4, then channel 4 random Grand Orbs. Channel another each turn.

Snecko:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
Snecko:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL (Damage is equal to the number of Unknown cards you started the combat with.)

Snecko:SoulDraw.NAME: Soul Draw
Snecko:SoulDraw.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw between 1 and 3 cards. NL Discard between 1 and !M! random cards.

Snecko:SnekBite.NAME: Snek Bite
Snecko:SnekBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw a card.

Snecko:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
Snecko:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Snecko:SoulExchange.NAME: Soul Exchange
Snecko:SoulExchange.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw a card, then Exhaust a card. Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class with randomized costs.
Snecko:SoulExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw 2 cards, then Exhaust a card. Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class with randomized costs.

Snecko:SoulCleanse.NAME: Soul Cleanse
Snecko:SoulCleanse.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Reduce the cost of a random card that costs 3 or more in your hand to 0.
Snecko:SoulCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw a card. NL Reduce the cost of a random card that costs 3 or more in your hand to 0.

Snecko:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
Snecko:SoulRoll.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.
Snecko:SoulRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Draw a card. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.

Snecko:UnknownCommonAttack.NAME: Lil Snek Attack
Snecko:UnknownCommonAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Common Attack.

Snecko:UnknownUncommonAttack.NAME: Snek Attack
Snecko:UnknownUncommonAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Uncommon Attack.

Snecko:UnknownRareAttack.NAME: Big Snek Attack
Snecko:UnknownRareAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Rare Attack.

Snecko:UnknownCommonSkill.NAME: Lil Snek Skill
Snecko:UnknownCommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Common Skill.

Snecko:UnknownUncommonSkill.NAME: Snek Skill
Snecko:UnknownUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Uncommon Skill.

Snecko:UnknownRareSkill.NAME: Big Snek Skill
Snecko:UnknownRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Rare Skill.

Snecko:UnknownCommonPower.NAME: Lil Snek Power
Snecko:UnknownCommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Common Power.

Snecko:UnknownUncommonPower.NAME: Snek Power
Snecko:UnknownUncommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Uncommon Power.

Snecko:UnknownRarePower.NAME: Big Snek Power
Snecko:UnknownRarePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Unknown Upgraded Rare Power.

Snecko:ColorShift.NAME: Snechameleon
Snecko:ColorShift.DESCRIPTION: Snekproof. NL Gain a random buff effect at the start of each turn.
